question: Thank you...Yes, I'm taking med for high blood pressure and diabetes...no I'm not taking steriods and I'm not a heavy weight lifter, I lift weight but nothing really heavy because I have had several back surgerys...I'm also experencing ED issues..Since the age of 13,  I was told by a dr. that my scrotum was small but nothing was ever done about it...testie were always big, but now they are less then half there normal size. title: shrinking testicles
